overview: The spectacular successes and memorable characters of the Boston Red Sox are legendary in the annals of baseball history. RED SOX MEMORIES: THE GREATEST MOMENTS IN BOSTON RED SOX HISTORY celebrates these October heroes, fascinating characters and amazing rookies. You'll see the unveiling of an all-time Red Sox dream team that will inspire countless memories of more great BOSOX performances that cemented the team's unparalleled legacy. The Red Sox timeline stretches back more than a century, from 1903 when they won the first-ever World Series championship, to 2007 when a seventh World Series trophy took up residence at Fenway Park. And the story line overflows with some of the greatest and most compelling players in baseball history too.
tagline: The greatest moments in Boston Red Sox history
title: Red Sox Memories
